column4: hi, my networking is very frequently crapping out.  i'm on a wired lan on which everyone else seems to have good service.  things worked fine until a few days ago.  /etc/init.d/networking restart always fixes the problem, but never for long.  any clues on how to track this down?
well, depending on how pedantic people are.  its made by ibm
the ISA is probably specialized for the console
